name: Monster Slayer Extermination
description:
Monster Slayer Extermination is the first chapter of the saga, and in its Tournament edition you will be able to compete with other friends to see who is the best exterminator. You will be able to see a wide variety of enemies in advance of what the next update will bring as we prepare for the story mode. In this installment you will be able to start the adventure in a post-apocalyptic world where you will have to escape from a destroyed city full of enemies in which the action is currently taking place.

This chapter lasts half an hour, which is just the time it will take for the city to be destroyed and you with it, so hurry up because you do not have much time before they launch the missiles that will destroy the city.

FEATURES



► 3D third person shooter.

► Tournament edition with ranking and classification. Be the best monster slayer!

► This is the first chapter of the saga in which you will have to survive the zombie holocaust that has been unleashed in the city.

► Management of ammunition, inventory and weapons to be able to survive.

► Aggressive mechanics and hostile creatures.

► Epic boss battle.
